Question
========

Given is the table for two dichotomous variables

  ----------- ----- ------- man woman glasses 13 32 no glasses 9 43 ----------- ----- -------

What is the ᵪ^2^ value of this data for the test of independence?

Answerlist
----------

* ᵪ2 = 0.693.
* ᵪ2 = 0.951.
* ᵪ2 = 1.845.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* ᵪ2 = 0.693.: Incorrect
* ᵪ2 = 0.951.: Incorrect
* ᵪ2 = 1.845.: Correct
